Description of incident: On January 25, 2018, ATI began the process of mailing out Form 1099s to individuals and companies for the 2017 tax year. However, during the mailing process, an error occurred whereby approximately sixty-seven (67) recipients received their Form 1099 and the Form 1099 belonging to an unrelated individual or entity. On or around January 30, 2018, ATI discovered the error. ATI immediately commenced an investigation and confirmed the incident was the result of human error. ATI took steps to address the error to reduce the likelihood of a similar incident occurring in the future.
